Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

From the hillside she smiled. Hearing his voice again did bring joy to her. 
as well as an ache.. an ache to be at the base, to be in hi arms. But, the 
reality was, she had a duty to do. 

"I very much missed you," she purred. Her voice was rather soft. "I awaited 
for you to be repaired. Perceptor stated your damage was great & that it would 
take some time to repair the damaged areas. Then I was called away."

She pondered a moment, as a sweet yet sly smile came upon her face, "I was 
never bored," she paused, "Just lonely," she hated the idea of spilling her 
emotions & feeling them, but.. she let them this time. How she ached for him. 

Then turning a little serious. "I have Blackstorm. We are on a rendezvous 
with some newly arrived Decepticons. We shall bring them back soon enough." 

--part1_32.3938cd66.2c05aa64_boundary
